entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is trying not to laugh and is mentioned as being good at healing minor injuries.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is worried about Harry and is trying to comfort him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story and is mentioned as being scared but also feeling like he always knew he'd have to face Voldemort in the end.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is a person who said something about the prophecy that made Hermione and Ron think it might be related to Harry.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a person who is mentioned as being the subject of the prophecy and is someone Harry has to face in the end.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who collected Harry in person and might be telling him something about the prophecy.

relationships.description: Harry has to face Voldemort in the end, as mentioned by Harry himself.
Hermione is worried about Harry and is trying to comfort him.
Ron is trying to comfort Harry along with Hermione.
